entry.title: floating through the air
entry.summary: i'm a big balloon floating through the air I have a long string it flails around unattached, I float higher and higher stuck in the clouds please someone grab it hold it tight, keep me grounded please someone let me go don't hold me back…
entry.content:
i'm a big balloon
floating through the air
I have a long string
it flails around
unattached,
I float higher and higher
stuck in the clouds

please someone grab it
hold it tight,
keep me grounded

please someone let me go
don't hold me back

back and forth
hold it
let it go

the string is my physical form
the balloon is my mental state
I've always had a love-hate relationship with my physical form.
give the string for free to anyone willing to grab it
pull the string away and never let anyone get close

keep the string taut
maintain a safe distance from its holder

Wait, I don't need another to keep me grounded
another to prove I'm worthy
I can hold my own string

holding my string
complete and aware
healthy safe
being my whole self
I show up in the world
grounded and flying high

entry.title: Overthinking
entry.summary: V1 thinking of you thinking of me are you i hope you are thinking of you having a good time did you i hope you did So many thoughts swirling around Why you Let me think on that Overthinking Lets not over think this V2…
entry.content:
V1
thinking of you thinking of me
are you
i hope you are

thinking of you having a good time
did you
i hope you did

So many thoughts swirling around
Why you
Let me think on that

Overthinking
Lets not over think this

V2
thinking of you being my muse
are you
you already are

thinking of you thinking it thru
did you
I hope you did

Overthinking
Lets not over think this

Chorus
Lo key stressin
Borderline obsessin
Wishful thinking
But theres only right now
This moment

Lo key stressin
Borderline obsessin
Wishful thinking
But theres only right now
This moment

Bridge

thinking about all the things
there are to think about
and thinking of you

Overthinking

SOLO

V3
thinking of you thinking of me
are you
i hope you are

thinking of you having a good time
did you
i hope you did

Overthinking
Lets not over think this


Lyrics by Vicki Langford.  Guitar: Marty Simon.  Drums:  Zev Stein.
